General.Name: Fulcrum Utility Services Ltd
General.Description: Fulcrum Utility Services Limited provides multi-utility infrastructure services and solutions in the United Kingdom. The company operates in two segments, Infrastructure: Design and Build, and Utility assets: Own and Operate. It engages in the designing, installing, and delivers new electricity, gas, water, and fiber connections for homebuilders; provision of electric vehicle charging infrastructure; connecting and maintaining renewable energy generating infrastructure, including battery storage sites, wind, and solar farms. In addition, the company is involved in high voltage electrical infrastructure services. The company serves housing, industrial, commercial, electric vehicle, high voltage connections, and smart metering sectors. Fulcrum Utility Services Limited was incorporated in 2008 and is headquartered in Sheffield, the United Kingdom.
General.Address: Sheffield Business Park, Sheffield, United Kingdom, S9 1XH
